1959. You can download the dataset directly from here:
 daily-total-female-births.csv 3
Save the ﬁle with the ﬁlename daily-total-female-births.csv in your current working
directory. We can load this dataset as a Pandas Series using the function read csv() and
summarize the shape of the dataset.
# load
series = read_csv(' daily-total-female-births.csv' , header=0, index_col=0)
# summarize shape
print(series.shape)
Listing 11.27: Example of loading the daily female births dataset.
